channel.title: Throne of Lies 2nd anniversary - Forum Event
channel.description:
Hey everyone :wave:
It's been 2 years since the release of game which brought us together. A lot of people has visited our community and many of them decided to stay.
## Happy anniversary to all of you.
There wouldn't be much of a community if not for people who create it.
We started small, but now we are many, not only in numbers, but in talent and creativity. And hence creativity is what we would love to show through our event.
**As such, we have prepared some fun games to celebrate the occasion:**
- [Alternative Universe FoL](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-sfol-00-the-alternative-universe-signups-16-16/78353) - Forum of Lies game, where players create the classes. - [Paint your mafia... mafia](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-paint-your-mafia-mafia-signups-11-x/78352) - Forum Mafia where you can perform any action you want, as long as you draw it. - [Escape the night](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/misc-escape-the-night-signups-5-11/78372) - Misc game with roleplay elements, where survival depends on your wits. - [Make my story](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/make-my-story-writing-challange/78414) - Fanfic/story writing challange with a twist.
**Also at 29.09 we will run a selection of short minigames, including:** - Turbo Legacy Mafia - 3 short mafia games with result of each influencing the next ones. - Live games plaied via discord - Jackbox, wolfia ect.
**Starting 7pm GMT / 3pm ET.**
### Lottery: Participation in each event will grant you tickets toward the lottery, which will be held on 10th Oct.
**Prizes pool include:** - Game keys - Official ToL mousepads - Exclusive forum titles - Kissel And more!
.
Once again, thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you at the event!
*eevee | Forum Moderator*

item.title: Throne of Lies 2nd anniversary - Forum Event
item.dc:creator: eevee
item.description:
Hey everyone

It’s been 2 years since the release of game which brought us together. A lot of people has visited our community and many of them decided to stay.

Happy anniversary to all of you.

There wouldn’t be much of a community if not for people who create it.

We started small, but now we are many, not only in numbers, but in talent and creativity. And hence creativity is what we would love to show through our event.

As such, we have prepared some fun games to celebrate the occasion:

  • Alternative Universe FoL - Forum of Lies game, where players create the classes.
  • Paint your mafia… mafia - Forum Mafia where you can perform any action you want, as long as you draw it.
  • Escape the night - Misc game with roleplay elements, where survival depends on your wits.
  • Make my story - Fanfic/story writing challange with a twist.

Also at 29.09 we will run a selection of short minigames, including:

  • Turbo Legacy Mafia - 3 short mafia games with result of each influencing the next ones.
  • Live games plaied via discord - Jackbox, wolfia ect.

Starting 7pm GMT / 3pm ET.

Lottery:

Participation in each event will grant you tickets toward the lottery, which will be held on 10th Oct.

Prizes pool include:

  • Game keys
  • Official ToL mousepads
  • Exclusive forum titles
  • Kissel
    And more!

.

Once again, thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you at the event!

eevee | Forum Moderator

Read full topic
